alert_info_message: When users have no available usage, the package purchase instructions will be returned to guide users to purchase. This feature only manages WeChat Official Account, WeChat Mini Program, and WeChat Customer Service external services; other channels are not managed
label_contact_qrcode: Contact QR Code (WeChat QR code recommended for easy user contact)
label_preview_title: Default image returned for users without usage
popover_save_tip: Configuration changes take effect after saving
modal_confirm_delete_qrcode: Confirm to delete the contact QR code?
error_image_format: Only JPG and PNG image formats are supported
